## Introducción. ¿Se han polarizado las percepciones de conflicto? {-#intro}
</p>

\begin{flushright}
\leftskip=5.5 cm
\rightskip=1 cm\textit{``The rich and the poor in a country with a highly unequal distribution of wealth . . . may live next to each other, but their lives do not intersect. . . . In such societies, neither the rich nor the poor have any sense of a shared fate. . . . In turn, each group looks out for its own interests and is likely to see the demands of the other as conflicting with its own well-being.''} \\
\vspace{.2em}
\leftskip= 5.5 cm
\rightskip=1 cm---(Rothstein and Uslaner, 2005, p.46).
\end{flushright}
